reporting-org.narrative: Ministry for Foreign Affairs of Finland

title.narrative: CECE II - Environment Health and ICT

description.narrative: In the Masai villages in CECE project area there are more orphaned children and young people now than in the beginning of the project in 2014. There has been in average 150 children and youth attending the twice monthly environmental afternoons. There has been about 3500 participants in a year. In CECE-II project the plan is to include health education and information technology training besides the environmental topics in 2017-2020. The total volyme of the trainings are not increased. The aim is to encoura ge the local community to develop the situation of the orhans with small seed money and shared skills. The trunk of the activities will be the twice monthly CECE training afternoons in Jerico center. The local experts will be conducting the environment edu cation. The health education will be developed by a Finnish doctor who has special knowledge in healthcare in developing countries and tropical diseases. The information technology teaching will be started by a Finnish expert with long experience in ICT us e in teaching.
